trends: There have been no other sightings in Millersville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright light in the sky, moving very slowly to the right. I went in to get the camera and when I came back it was gone.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister was outside in the front of our house and txted me to come outside.When i came outside she pointed in the sky to a bright light that was moving very slowly to the right.It also had blinking light on it.After we ruled out that it was not an airplane or a star or anything of that nature i called a friend that lived about 15 mins away and told him to go outside and look at the sky to see if he saw this object in the sky.He confirmed that he did.After that my sis and i watched it for about 10 mins then i went inside to get my camera,when i came back out it was gone.
